Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.render.sprites

Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.render.sprites.Door
  • public class Door
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a door object. There are two types of doors, vertical and not vertical. Normal doors are when there are walls next to the door. Vertical doors are when there are walls above and below the door.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the frame of the current animation. If it is closed it won't animate. If open, will only animate once.

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Gets the current frame of animation.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage of the current frame.

      • isVertical

        public boolean isVertical()
        Checks to see if it is a vertically aligned door.
        Returns:
        True if the door has a wall above or below it.

      • setIsSolid

        public void setIsSolid​(boolean isSolid)
        Updates the sprite to it's new status.
        Parameters:
        isSolid - True if the door is solid (un-walkable)
